RDP Enabled.Remediation: Disable RDP if not required. If required, restrict access (VPN/Jump host), enforce NLA, and limit by firewall scope.

RDP NLA Not Required.Remediation: Require Network Level Authentication (NLA) for RDP connections.

SMBv1 Enabled.Remediation: Disable SMBv1 on all systems. SMBv1 is legacy and increases exposure to lateral movement and wormable attacks.

SMB Signing Not Required (Server).Remediation: Require SMB signing on servers via Group Policy / security options.

SMB Signing Not Required (Client).Remediation: Require SMB signing on clients via Group Policy / security options.

Firewall Disabled.Remediation: Enable Windows Defender Firewall for all profiles and manage consistently via Group Policy.

Defender Real-time Protection Disabled.Remediation: Enable real-time protection and ensure Defender is managed/enforced by policy.

Defender Antivirus Disabled.Remediation: Ensure an approved antivirus solution is enabled and reporting healthy status.
